cross: Laeliocattleya Puppy Love x Laelia rubescens

measurements.description: Forty-seven flowers and eight buds on ten upright staked 62-cm inflorescences facing one direction; immaculately grown 56-cm wide, 96-cm tall plant, 30-cm x 15-cm plastic pot; flowers white, delicately flushed pink-lavender; lip ruffled, white suffused light yellow centrally, red veins in throat, light pink-lavender margins; substance firm; texture diamond dust; higher score precluded by slight mildew on petal reverse on some flowers.
